title: IRevisionCloud.IGetNext
description: Gets the next revision cloud in a drawing view or sheet.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an IRevisionCloud VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
You can traverse the revision cloud annotations in a drawing view as follows:
Call
IView::IGetFirstRevisionCloud
to get the first revision cloud.
Call this method
IView::GetRevisionCloudCount
times to access the other revision clouds.
